body:
## What's Changed

* Update ld64.lld by @keith in https://github.com/keith/rules_apple_linker/pull/59


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/keith/rules_apple_linker/compare/0.5.1...0.5.2


See [the README](https://github.com/keith/rules_apple_linker) for general usage.

`MODULE.bazel` setup:

```bzl
bazel_dep(name = "rules_apple_linker", version = "0.5.2")
```

`WORKSPACE` setup:

```bzl
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "rules_apple_linker",
    sha256 = "8b1b9eda2733b0a926c5543eac2c3849b7bad25033a637a1e27c14cae53f0447",
    strip_prefix = "rules_apple_linker-0.5.2",
    url = "https://github.com/keith/rules_apple_linker/archive/refs/tags/0.5.2.tar.gz",
)

load("@rules_apple_linker//:deps.bzl", "rules_apple_linker_deps")

rules_apple_linker_deps()
```

This release includes [`lld` 03-15-25](https://github.com/keith/ld64.lld/releases/tag/03-15-25)

* Update lld

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/keith/rules_apple_linker/compare/0.5.0...0.5.1

See [the README](https://github.com/keith/rules_apple_linker) for general usage.

`MODULE.bazel` setup:

```bzl
bazel_dep(name = "rules_apple_linker", version = "0.5.1")
```

`WORKSPACE` setup:

```bzl
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "rules_apple_linker",
    sha256 = "80c1d608f52d880c9315c493a500ab29238d48633e5aabc49f109c1cfab4b071",
    strip_prefix = "rules_apple_linker-0.5.1",
    url = "https://github.com/keith/rules_apple_linker/archive/refs/tags/0.5.1.tar.gz",
)

load("@rules_apple_linker//:deps.bzl", "rules_apple_linker_deps")

rules_apple_linker_deps()
```

This release includes [`lld` 10-21-24](https://github.com/keith/ld64.lld/releases/tag/10-21-24)

* Remove zld since it's no longer being updated. You can still use it with `apple_linker_override` if needed
* Fix support for single or multiple files or targets as the `linker` attribute
* Fix support for bazel @ HEAD

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/keith/rules_apple_linker/compare/0.4.0...0.5.0

See [the README](https://github.com/keith/rules_apple_linker) for general usage.

`MODULE.bazel` setup:

```bzl
bazel_dep(name = "rules_apple_linker", version = "0.5.0")
```

`WORKSPACE` setup:

```bzl
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "rules_apple_linker",
    sha256 = "0136f56de6f3857d0ca1922c21a858c65120408b8f24d0d49e2f1e12112ed59b",
    strip_prefix = "rules_apple_linker-0.5.0",
    url = "https://github.com/keith/rules_apple_linker/archive/refs/tags/0.5.0.tar.gz",
)

load("@rules_apple_linker//:deps.bzl", "rules_apple_linker_deps")

rules_apple_linker_deps()
```

This release includes [`lld` 4-6-23](https://github.com/keith/ld64.lld/releases/tag/4-6-23)

name: Add support for linker targets with runfiles
body:
This release allows you to use `apple_linker_override`'s `linker` attribute with a target that produces multiple files rather than a single file. This is useful if you need to wrap a linker in a `sh_binary` or similar target.

See [the README](https://github.com/keith/rules_apple_linker) for general usage.

`MODULE.bazel` setup:

```bzl
bazel_dep(name = "rules_apple_linker", version = "0.4.0")
```

`WORKSPACE` setup:

```bzl
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "rules_apple_linker",
    sha256 = "70b664b3ddc335178d163f487d0bda5e895f3dc00d311c17c3b4050e780056b8",
    strip_prefix = "rules_apple_linker-0.4.0",
    url = "https://github.com/keith/rules_apple_linker/archive/refs/tags/0.4.0.tar.gz",
)

load("@rules_apple_linker//:deps.bzl", "rules_apple_linker_deps")

rules_apple_linker_deps()
```

This release includes [`zld` 1.3.3](https://github.com/michaeleisel/zld/releases/tag/1.3.3) and [`lld` 4-6-23](https://github.com/keith/ld64.lld/releases/tag/4-6-23)

name: Add bzlmod support, remove mold
body:
See [the README](https://github.com/keith/rules_apple_linker) for general usage. If you'd still like to use mold you can use `apple_linker_override` and set the `linker` attribute to your binary.

`WORKSPACE` setup:

```bzl
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "rules_apple_linker",
    sha256 = "a8aecd86d9c63677a8f1a3849c52c05d4aed1d1d9c209db2904f53f8973731d4",
    strip_prefix = "rules_apple_linker-0.3.0",
    url = "https://github.com/keith/rules_apple_linker/archive/refs/tags/0.3.0.tar.gz",
)

load("@rules_apple_linker//:deps.bzl", "rules_apple_linker_deps")

rules_apple_linker_deps()
```

This release includes [`zld` 1.3.3](https://github.com/michaeleisel/zld/releases/tag/1.3.3) and [`lld` 12-22-22](https://github.com/keith/ld64.lld/releases/tag/12-22-22).

name: Add mold support
body:
Note: mold macho support is incomplete, so it may or may not work in your use case

See [the README](https://github.com/keith/rules_apple_linker) for general usage.

`WORKSPACE` setup:


name: LLD update
body:
This change updated lld to include some fixes for using non-standard frameworks like TensorFlow

See [the README](https://github.com/keith/rules_apple_linker) for general usage.

`WORKSPACE` setup:

```bzl
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "rules_apple_linker",
    sha256 = "38a1d68a1c315a7f2aa14968536879792aec6534640324033aca8d7154e4f884",
    strip_prefix = "rules_apple_linker-0.1.2",
    url = "https://github.com/keith/rules_apple_linker/archive/refs/tags/0.1.2.tar.gz",
)

load("@rules_apple_linker//:deps.bzl", "rules_apple_linker_deps")

rules_apple_linker_deps()
```

This release includes [`zld` 1.3.3](https://github.com/michaeleisel/zld/releases/tag/1.3.3) and [`lld` 2-11-22](https://github.com/keith/ld64.lld/releases/tag/2-11-22)

name: Faster LLD
body:
The only change in this release is that LLD was rebuilt with LTO to be even faster than before.

See [the README](https://github.com/keith/rules_apple_linker) for general usage.

`WORKSPACE` setup:

```bzl
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "rules_apple_linker",
    sha256 = "a2626f0d31ab5ad697ad6ae0fa84856e79abb0be2aa641fed731aa759c8beda9",
    strip_prefix = "rules_apple_linker-0.1.1",
    url = "https://github.com/keith/rules_apple_linker/archive/refs/tags/0.1.1.tar.gz",
)

load("@rules_apple_linker//:deps.bzl", "rules_apple_linker_deps")

rules_apple_linker_deps()
```

This release includes [`zld` 1.3.3](https://github.com/michaeleisel/zld/releases/tag/1.3.3) and [`lld` 1/30/22](https://github.com/keith/ld64.lld/releases/tag/1-30-22)
